column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Previous reviewers have covered the wonders of the Art Institute very well. I have to add my two cents
column4: concerts and tours. Take a look at the AIC's online calendar and you'll notice they have lectures given by noted art experts three or four days a week
column5: and often in the evenings or on weekends
column6: too. And the Avalon Quartet and other musical groups give beautiful
column7: free or moderately priced concerts. Listening to classical music under the stained glass dome in Fullerton Hall is my idea of heaven.
